name: Population-100
description:
Population 100 is a 3D Tower Defense game about a small moon base with a population of 100 people in it.

The objective of the game is to help them escape before something bad will happen...

The game was created using Godot 3.5

This game was originally for the Godot Wild Jam #48, but because I joined late, I wasn't able to publish it on time.

It's still a decent game in my opinion, so enjoy :)
